data.md:MetaData: (Table 4) Morphologic variability in the Globorotalia puncticulata group and abundances of dominant species at DSDP Hole 80-548
35 cores, 211 m cored, 0 m drilled, 99.6 % recovery
A sedimentological, faunal, and isotopic record of the middle-to-late Pliocene transition in the northeastern Atlantic, Deep Sea Drilling Project Site 548
